author: andschwa
body:
This resolves #1127, #739, and unblocks #459.

/cc @vors @dantraMSFT @TravisEz13 @nitinbps @mirichmo @lilyfang 
- All projects (I think) are now delay signed with our public key
- The SecureString stub is delay signed with the correct extracted public key (thanks @dantraMSFT)
- The `AssemblyInfo.cs` files have been updated so that the signing is setup by project.json instead
- The CentOS RID was fixed due to a separate issue (.NET Core has stopped supporting 7.1 specifically)
- The MMIN and MMI packages were recreated with updated .nuspec files for the downgraded dependency

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: It would be wise to clear you local NuGet package caches to ensure that the 24027 builds are picked up, and not newer ones.

title: Downgrade .NET Core packages to Nano's build rc2-24027
